Articles.Content:
So I just updated KSP for a mod, and I've got a problem right now. When KSP loads into title screen, everything is fine, except for buttons. I can't see them. I can click them, but there's no text on them. What do I do? Why is it not working?

Log link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B6KYvyYqPqr-QXExREdBT1Q3aEk/view?usp=sharing

also, how do I attach files using Insert other media?

Is it anything like this?

If yes the answer is in there as well: Do NOT [Alt] + [Tab] while the game is loading.

Terrain exists in main screen, but I'm not alt tabbing since im in windowed. Also, on main menu the text always disappears, but when I press start game, text appears, but if I switch to other window it dissappears. But actually I am running KSP x64 Windows 10.
Hi @ajud, can you please test a fresh install to see if it is the mods or not, thank you.

ok. I will try to do that when I will finish my ship test run

Oh, and also. The terrain for mun actually dissapears.

Edit: I think the camera is a little bit too low, because in main menu screen, I can see the terrain a little bit

So the title title screen text appears when using an unmodded installiation. So now I know that it is the problem with a mod, or mods.

Edited March 5, 2017 by ajud
forgot stuff
